sun.description: The star at the center of our Solar System.

mercury.description: The smallest planet in the Solar System and the closest to the Sun.

venus.description: The second planet from the Sun, known for its thick, toxic atmosphere.

earth.description: Our home. The only known celestial body to harbor life.

moon.description: Earth's only natural satellite, the fifth largest moon in the Solar System.

mars.description: The Red Planet. A cold, dusty world with polar ice caps and ancient riverbeds.

phobos.description: The larger and innermost of the two natural satellites of Mars.

deimos.description: The smaller and outermost of the two natural satellites of Mars.

jupiter.description: The largest planet in the Solar System, a gas giant with powerful storms.

io.description: The most volcanically active object in the Solar System.

europa.description: Jupiter's icy moon with a subsurface ocean that may harbor life.

ganymede.description: The largest moon in the Solar System, bigger than Mercury.

callisto.description: Jupiter's outermost Galilean moon, heavily cratered and ancient.

saturn.description: The sixth planet, famous for its prominent ring system.

titan.description: Saturn's largest moon, with a thick atmosphere and methane lakes.

uranus.description: An ice giant that rotates on its side, with faint rings.

titania.description: The largest moon of Uranus, covered in canyons and ice.

oberon.description: The outermost major moon of Uranus.

neptune.description: The windiest planet, a dark, cold ice giant with supersonic storms.

triton.description: Neptune's largest moon, likely a captured Kuiper Belt object.

pluto.description: A dwarf planet in the Kuiper Belt, with a heart-shaped nitrogen glacier.

charon.description: Pluto's largest moon, so big it and Pluto orbit a common center.

menu.missionModeDesc: Historical progression starting in 1957. Unlock parts and technology as you advance through space history.
menu.sandboxModeDesc: All parts unlocked! Start in 2100 with full access to every technology.

ui.exitToMenuPrompt: Progress will NOT be saved (Guest Mode). Continue?

settings.saveConfirmMsg: This will update your profile and controls.
